name: Zerulon's Ruins
description:
I sit on Zerulon’s border, looking out over the ruins of my homeland.

How far had we fallen, and for how long?

The rain falls gently, leaving dots on the stones laid low before my eyes.

DETAILS

System: Breathless (Streamlined)

Type: Roleplaying

Genre: Fantasy

Mechanics: Single die success > TN

Intended Players: 3-5

Supplies needed: d4, d6, d8, d10, writing space/implement (technically optional)

Setup time: 15 minutes

Session time: 2-4 hours.
